_p01.Name: v_Disk
_p01.Value: AS SELECT Disk.* FROM Disk WHERE (Disk.bDeleted = No);

_p02.Name: v_File
_p02.Value: AS SELECT File.* FROM File WHERE (File.bDeleted = No);

_p03.Name: v_Folder
_p03.Value: AS SELECT Folder.* FROM Folder WHERE (Folder.bDeleted = No);

_p04.Name: sp_ctl_GetRootFolders
_p04.Value: AS SELECT v_Folder.Folder_ID, v_Folder.Name, v_Disk.UneekID, v_Folder.Disk_ID, v_Disk.DateAdded, v_Disk.Type FROM v_Disk INNER JOIN v_Folder ON v_Disk.Disk_ID = v_Folder.Disk_ID WHERE (v_Folder.Disk_ID + v_Folder.Parent_ID = 0) ORDER BY v_Disk.Sequence;

_p05.Name: sp_ctl_GetFolderContents

_p06.Name: sp_ctl_GetChildFolders

_p07.Name: sp_ctl_GetDiskFolderInfo_FileID
_p07.Value: (inFileID LONG) AS SELECT Disk.UneekID, Disk.Sequence, Disk.Name, Disk.DateAdded, File.Name, Folder.Name, File.FileSize, File.Alias, File.DateModified, File.Folder_ID FROM (Disk INNER JOIN Folder ON Disk.Disk_ID = Folder.Disk_ID) INNER JOIN File ON Folder.Folder_ID = File.Folder_ID WHERE (File.File_ID = inFileID);

_p08.Name: sp_ctl_GetDiskFolderInfo_FolderID
_p08.Value: (inFolderID LONG) AS SELECT Disk.UneekID, Disk.Sequence, Disk.Name, Folder.DateModified, Disk.DateAdded, Folder.Name, Folder.Folder_ID FROM Disk INNER JOIN Folder ON Disk.Disk_ID = Folder.Disk_ID WHERE (Folder.Folder_ID = inFolderID);

_p09.Name: sp_ctl_GetDiskInfo

_p10.Name: sp_ctl_GetFolderContents_SearchAlias
_p10.Value: (inSearchName VARCHAR(255)) AS SELECT v_File.Folder_ID, v_File.Name, v_File.Alias, v_File.File_ID, v_File.Extension, v_File.DateModified, v_File.FileSize FROM v_File INNER JOIN v_Disk ON v_File.Disk_ID = v_Disk.Disk_ID WHERE (v_File.Alias LIKE '%' + inSearchName + '%') ORDER BY v_File.Alias;

_p11.Name: sp_ctl_GetFolderContents_SearchAll
_p11.Value: (inSearchName VARCHAR(255)) AS SELECT v_Folder.Folder_ID, v_File.Name, v_File.Alias, v_File.File_ID, v_File.Extension, v_File.DateModified, v_File.FileSize FROM (v_File INNER JOIN v_Folder ON v_File.Folder_ID = v_Folder.Folder_ID) INNER JOIN v_Disk ON (v_Folder.Disk_ID = v_Disk.Disk_ID) AND (v_File.Disk_ID = v_Disk.Disk_ID) WHERE (v_File.Alias LIKE '%' + inSearchName + '%') OR (v_File.Name LIKE '%' + inSearchName + '%') OR (v_Folder.Name LIKE '%' + inSearchName + '%') ORDER BY v_File.Name;

_p12.Name: sp_ctl_GetFolderContents_SearchFiles
_p12.Value: (inSearchName VARCHAR(255)) AS SELECT v_File.Folder_ID, v_File.Name, v_File.Alias, v_File.File_ID, v_File.Extension, v_File.DateModified, v_File.FileSize FROM v_File INNER JOIN v_Disk ON v_File.Disk_ID = v_Disk.Disk_ID WHERE (v_File.Name LIKE '%' + inSearchName + '%') ORDER BY v_File.Name;

_p13.Name: sp_ctl_GetFolderContents_SearchFolders
_p13.Value: (inSearchName VARCHAR(255)) AS SELECT v_File.Name, v_File.Alias, v_File.DateModified, v_File.Extension, v_File.FileSize, v_File.File_ID FROM (v_File INNER JOIN v_Folder ON v_File.Folder_ID = v_Folder.Folder_ID) INNER JOIN v_Disk ON v_Folder.Disk_ID = v_Disk.Disk_ID WHERE (v_Folder.Name LIKE '%' + inSearchName + '%') ORDER BY v_File.Name;

_p14.Name: sp_del_MarkedDisks
_p14.Value: AS DELETE Disk.* FROM Disk WHERE (Disk.bDeleted = Yes);

_p15.Name: sp_del_MarkedFiles
_p15.Value: AS DELETE File.* FROM File WHERE (File.bDeleted = Yes)

_p16.Name: sp_del_MarkedFolders
_p16.Value: AS DELETE Folder.* FROM Folder WHERE (Folder.bDeleted = Yes)

_p17.Name: sp_GetDiskID
_p17.Value: (inUneekID VARCHAR(255)) AS SELECT Disk.Disk_ID FROM Disk WHERE (Disk.UneekID = inUneekID);

_p18.Name: sp_GetDiskID_FileID
_p18.Value: (inFileID LONG) AS SELECT Disk.Disk_ID, Disk.UneekID FROM File INNER JOIN Disk ON File.Disk_ID = Disk.Disk_ID WHERE (File.File_ID = inFileID);

_p19.Name: sp_GetDiskID_FolderID
_p19.Value: (inFolderID LONG) AS SELECT Disk.Disk_ID, Disk.UneekID FROM Disk INNER JOIN Folder ON Disk.Disk_ID = Folder.Disk_ID WHERE (Folder.Folder_ID = inFolderID);

_p20.Name: sp_GetFolderID

_p21.Name: sp_GetFolderID_FileID

_p22.Name: sp_GetMaxDiskSequence
_p22.Value: AS SELECT Max(Sequence) AS MaxSequence FROM Disk;

_p23.Name: sp_GetParentFolder

_p24.Name: sp_rpt_DiskContents
_p24.Value: (inDiskID LONG) AS SELECT Disk.Name AS Disk_Name, Disk.DateAdded, Disk.Sequence, Folder.Name AS Folder_Name, Folder.DateModified AS Folder_DateModified, File.Name AS File_Name, File.DateModified AS File_DateModified, File.FileSize, Disk.Disk_ID FROM (Disk INNER JOIN Folder ON Disk.Disk_ID = Folder.Disk_ID) INNER JOIN File ON Folder.Folder_ID = File.Folder_ID WHERE (Disk.Disk_ID = inDiskID);

_p25.Name: sp_upd_DeleteDisk

_p26.Name: sp_upd_DeleteFile

_p27.Name: sp_upd_DeleteFolder

_p28.Name: sp_upd_DiskSequence

_p29.Name: sp_upd_FileAlias

_p30.Name: sp_Add_Disk

_p31.Name: sp_Add_File
_p31.Value: (inName VARCHAR(255), inAlias VARCHAR(255), inDateModified DATETIME, inExtension VARCHAR(255), inSize LONG, inCommand VARCHAR(255), inFolderID LONG, inDiskID LONG) AS INSERT INTO File ( Name, Alias, DateModified, Extension, FileSize, Command, Folder_ID, Disk_ID ) VALUES (inName, inAlias, inDateModified, inExtension, inSize, inCommand, inFolderID, inDiskID);

_p32.Name: sp_Add_Folder

_p33.Name: sp_del_MarkedDisks
_p33.Value: AS DELETE Disk.* FROM Disk WHERE (Disk.bDeleted = Yes);

_p34.Name: sp_del_MarkedFiles
_p34.Value: AS DELETE File.* FROM File WHERE (File.bDeleted = Yes)

_p35.Name: sp_del_MarkedFolders
_p35.Value: AS DELETE Folder.* FROM Folder WHERE (Folder.bDeleted = Yes)

_p36.Name: sp_ctl_GetFolderContents_SearchDates
_p36.Value: (inSearchFrom DATETIME, inSearchTo DATETIME) AS SELECT v_File.Folder_ID, v_File.Name, v_File.Alias, v_File.File_ID, v_File.Extension, v_File.DateModified, v_File.FileSize FROM v_File WHERE (v_File.DateModified BETWEEN inSearchFrom AND inSearchTo) ORDER BY v_File.DateModified;

_p37.Name: sp_ctl_GetFolderContents_SearchTypes
_p37.Value: (inSearchName VARCHAR(255)) AS SELECT v_File.Folder_ID, v_File.Name, v_File.Alias, v_File.File_ID, v_File.Extension, v_File.DateModified, v_File.FileSize FROM v_File INNER JOIN v_Disk ON v_File.Disk_ID = v_Disk.Disk_ID WHERE (v_File.Extension LIKE '%' + inSearchName + '%') ORDER BY v_File.Name;
